name: JDownloader
description: JDownloader2 is a free, open-source download management tool with Proton VPN CLI pre-installed for secure and private downloading. Supports MyJDownloader for remote management.

notes.text: JDownloader runs in headless mode. Use MyJDownloader (https://my.jdownloader.org) to manage downloads remotely.
Proton VPN requires manual login after container creation. Run: protonvpn-cli login <username>
Downloads are stored in /downloads by default.
Enable kill switch with: protonvpn-cli ks --on
